title: Diamond-Studded Leaf Motif Bridal Haaram Set
materials: Set with High-Quality Diamonds. Gold exhibits impeccable Hyderabadi Polish.
features: A stunning statement Haaram and earring set designed in a contemporary style with traditional leaf motifs. Features intricate lattice work, pave-set diamonds and two tone gold finish. The matching jhumkas echo the leaf design, creating a harmonious and graceful look.
colors: Rose Gold and White Gold accented with D-F color grade Diamonds
occasions: and special occasions like engagement ceremonies or grand parties. Suitable for bridal wear and festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi.
description: This exquisite necklace set offers a modern take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The use of two-tone gold enhances the brilliance of the diamonds, creating a luxurious and eye-catching effect. Expertly crafted with attention to detail, this set will make a cherished heirloom.
